sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>lack</radical> <radical>ice</radical>. So you go to the store and see if they have any. Nope, no ice. So, now you go to the <kanji>next</kanji> store. Is there ice here? Nope. Next!
meaningInfo: Feel a little frustrated you can't find ice. Have the words "<kanji>next</kanji> next next" echoing through your head as you go from store to store, irritated.
readingMnemonic: To remember the reading <ja>じ</ja>, we used the word "Jesus" - Finally, when you're at the last store in existence, you decide it's time to pray to <reading>Je</reading>sus (<ja>じ</ja>), asking for a miracle. He comes down from the heavens with ice in his hands.
readingInfo: Imagine him coming down. Imagine your surprise. He hands you the ice, and it's cold. You thank him, and he flies away.
